column1: 263212,ICT Support Engineer,,"Provide technical support for software maintenance or use
column3: Review computer information systems, procedures and networks
column5: Provide technical assistance to clients or users
column7: Troubleshoot issues with computer applications or systems
column9: Ensure business strategies comply with information security standards
column11: Modify software programs to improve performance
column13: Test computer system operations to ensure proper functioning
column21: Analyse data to identify or resolve operational problems
column23: Monitor computer system performance to ensure proper operation
column31: Anticipate the organisational implications of machine learning models
column33: Analyse security of systems, network or data
column35: Recommend changes to improve computer or information systems
column37: Assess network-related risks and specify recovery routines and contingency procedures
column39: Evaluate utility of software or hardware technologies
column47: Monitor the performance of computer networks
column51: Create electronic data backup to prevent loss of information
column57: Coordinate project activities with other staff or departments
column59: Conduct research to gain information about products or processes
column61: Train others in computer interface or software use
column63: Develop specifications for computer network operation
column65: Update knowledge about emerging industry or technology trends
column69: Implement security measures for computer or information systems
column71: Provide technical support for computer network issues
